message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm looking for $120 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob, but $90 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $110. Let me know if that's more to your liking.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking $100 would be a more comfortable price for me. Would you be willing to sell at that price?
